titleStmt.author: Davies, Richard, 1501-1581.

titleStmt.title: A funerall sermon preached the xxvi. day of Nouember in the yeare of our Lord M.D.LXXVI. in the parishe church of Caermerthyn, by the Reuerende Father in God, Richard by the permission of God, Bishoppe of Saint Dauys, at the buriall of the Right Honourable VValter Earle of Essex and Ewe ...
titleStmt.author: Davies, Richard, 1501-1581.
Waterhouse, Edward, Sir, 1535-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Henry Denham, dwelling in Pater noster Row, at the signe of the Starre,

notesStmt.note: Editor's dedication signed: E.W., i.e. Sir Edward Waterhouse.
With verses in Latin, Hebrew, Greek, Welsh, and French by various authors.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
